flawed_nl_solution:
Deshaun read 19200 pages because 60 x 320 = <<60*320=19200>>19200
The person closest to him read 144000 pages because 19200 x 0.75 = <<144000=144000>>144000
They read 1800 pages a day because 144000 / 80 = <<144000/80=1800>>1800
#### 1800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14400, not 144000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
